<title

    right="Feat 1"

>
[Natural Skill](/Feats.aspx?ID=71) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 57 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your ingenuity allows you to learn a wide variety of skills. You gain the trained proficiency rank in two skills of your choice.
name: Natural Skill
